String.name: Death Jolt
String.tooltip: Increases the chance to crit when enraged.

String.name: Retribution
String.tooltip: A certain about of damage is reflected when enraged.

String.name: Death Messenger
String.tooltip: Increases the respawn cooldown through Resonance power.

String.name: Plague
String.tooltip: Reduces HP recovery through Resonance power by 30%.

String.name: Chain Explosion
String.tooltip: In combat, the Resonance power explodes again and again. If the explosion hits, it triggers further explosions.

String.name: Dark Chain
String.tooltip: In combat, the Dark Chain wraps around its victim again and again.

String.name: Tentacle Prison
String.tooltip: In combat, a Tentacle Prison is summoned again and again. If it is not destroyed within the time limit, it explodes and causes huge damage in the area surrounding it.

String.name: Encouragement
String.tooltip: Increase damage through Resonance power, and restore a little HP and MP every 5 sec.

String.name: Death Jolt
String.tooltip: Increases the chance to crit when enraged.

String.name: Retribution
String.tooltip: A certain amount of damage is reflected when enraged.

String.name: Death Messenger
String.tooltip: Increases the respawn cooldown through Resonance power.

String.name: Plague
String.tooltip: Reduces HP recovery through Resonance power by 30%.

String.name: Chain Explosion
String.tooltip: In combat, the Resonance power explodes again and again. If the explosion hits, it triggers further explosions.

String.name: Dark Chain
String.tooltip: In combat, the Dark Chain wraps around its victim again and again.

String.name: Tentacle Prison
String.tooltip: In combat, a Tentacle Prison is summoned again and again. If it is not destroyed within the time limit, it explodes and causes huge damage in the area surrounding it.

String.name: Accelerated Rage
String.tooltip: Cursed Antaroth becomes enraged and summons up even more argon power.

String.name: Mana Disruption
String.tooltip: If you are hit, your MP is reduced even further. (Cannot be removed.)

String.name: Merciless
String.tooltip: Even if you are not stunned, the Cursed Antaroth unleashes a whirlwind.

String.name: Anti-Resurrection
String.tooltip: If you use a resurrect skill, an even more powerful attack will be used.

String.name: Exploitation
String.tooltip: If you die, all party members are dealt area damage and the Cursed Antaroth restores HP.

String.name: Change of Heart
String.tooltip: Depending on Nightmare Kelsaik's status, the temperature is further increased or decreased.

String.name: Fanatic
String.tooltip: During the fight against Nightmare Kelsaik, fanatics appear who alter the temperature.

String.name: Acid Attack I
String.tooltip: If Nightmare Kelsaik's enhanced flame or enhanced cold hits, a harmful effect is triggered.

String.name: Permanence
String.tooltip: If Nightmare Kelsaik's enhanced flame or enhanced cold hits, a constant flame or constant cold is generated.

String.name: Parasite
String.tooltip: Upon death, a parasite effect is spread throughout the area.
